serviceName: Amazon Pinpoint SMS and Voice Service

actions.name: CreateConfigurationSet
actions.description: Create a new configuration set. After you create the configuration set, you can add one or more event destinations to it.

actions.name: CreateConfigurationSetEventDestination
actions.description: Create a new event destination in a configuration set.

actions.name: DeleteConfigurationSetEventDestination
actions.description: Deletes an event destination in a configuration set.

actions.name: GetConfigurationSetEventDestinations
actions.description: Obtain information about an event destination, including the types of events it reports, the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination, and the name of the event destination.

actions.name: ListConfigurationSets
actions.description: Return a list of configuration sets. This operation only returns the configuration sets that are associated with your account in the current AWS Region.

actions.name: SendVoiceMessage
actions.description: Create a new voice message and send it to a recipient's phone number.

actions.name: UpdateConfigurationSetEventDestination
actions.description: Update an event destination in a configuration set. An event destination is a location that you publish information about your voice calls to. For example, you can log an event to an Amazon CloudWatch destination when a call fails.
